description: This course offers a further exploration of ballet vocabulary and technique for the advanced dancer with an emphasis on clarity, intention, and musicality. May be repeated with permission of instructor. Offered each semester. Prerequisite: DANCE 221. Open to dance majors and other students with instructor's permission.
name: Ballet III
prerequisites: DANCE 221. Open to dance majors and other students with instructor's permission.
